name: Wheel of Fortune
deep_meaning: The Wheel of Fortune represents cycles, destiny, and turning points. Life moves in cycles of good and bad fortune, and this card reminds us that change is the only constant. What goes up must come down, and what falls will rise again. The wheel teaches acceptance of life's natural rhythms and the understanding that we are part of something greater than ourselves. It speaks to karma, fate, and the interconnectedness of all things. When this card appears, significant change is afoot - embrace it rather than resist it.

symbolism.four_creatures: the four fixed signs and evangelists

upright_extended: The Wheel of Fortune represents cycles, destiny, and turning points. Life moves in cycles of good and bad fortune, and this card reminds us that change is the only constant. What goes up must come down, and what falls will rise again. The wheel teaches acceptance of life's natural rhythms and the understanding that we are part of something greater than ourselves. It speaks to karma, fate, and the interconnectedness of all things. When this card appears, significant change is afoot - embrace it rather than resist it.
reversed_extended: 역방향에서 Wheel of Fortune는 bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles을 나타냅니다.
numerology: Number 9 represents completion and spiritual attainment.
questions_to_ask: How can I embody the energy of Wheel of Fortune?
What does Wheel of Fortune teach me about my current situation?
